descriptionHtml:
Adds two bread related spells.

[i]The Spells[/i]

[b]Bread Thrall[/b] - Permanently summon a powerful Bread Atronach from the planes of Oblivion to serve you.

[b]Bound Bread[/b] - Conjure a loaf of magical bread into your pockets.

[i]What\'s the point of this?[/i]

If you\'re like me, you were most certainly disappointed by the lack of bread content in the game. I don\'t claim to be a remotely capable modder, so I could only do so much to fix this. That being said, this mod has a LOT of applications. The Bread Atronach is also capable of being romanced in a limited capacity. Simply conjure it in your bedroom and rest in bed, then you can pretend that you are in a committed relationship with your one true loaf.

[i]Where do I get these spells?[/i]

You can craft the spell loaves at any cooking pot, you only need a loaf of bread and some glow dust. And yes, in a cooking pot.

[i]Mod Compatibility[/i]

Nothing is changed, only added so there shouldn\'t be any conflicts. If there are any conflicts then I suggest getting rid of the offending mod.
author: Loshadt
